data.actual_result: The box is slightly outside the frame. Part of the decline button is gone / cut off.
data.expected_result: The box is aligned with the bottom of the frame, and no area is outside the frame or cut off.
data.short_description: Incoming call box can be dragged downwards so that part of the decline button is below the app frame.
data.steps_to_repro: - Windows only! - Start a call with friend. - Ask your friend not to accept the call. - Drag the incoming call box downwards so that it touches the floor of the application frame.
